query: SELECT r.id, r.room_id, r.reservation_date, r.start_time, s1.name as student1_name, s1.class_number as student1_class, s2.name as student2_name, s2.class_number as student2_class FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN students s1 ON r.student1_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN students s2 ON r.student2_id = s2.id ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC, r.start_time ASC LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Z1zdru8Y8PvAubS.root --database 53DPFAwTaFEfHG5hHzLeMS --execute SELECT r.id, r.room_id, r.reservation_date, r.start_time, s1.name as student1_name, s1.class_number as student1_class, s2.name as student2_name, s2.class_number as student2_class FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN students s1 ON r.student1_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN students s2 ON r.student2_id = s2.id ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC, r.start_time ASC LIMIT 20;
